mapper.select: SELECT p.project_no FROM project p ORDER BY p.project_no DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT p.project_no, p.project_title, p.project_start_date, p.project_end_date, p.project_status, m.member_no, m.name FROM project p INNER JOIN project_member pm ON p.project_no = pm.project_no INNER JOIN member m ON m.member_no = pm.member_no WHERE m.member_no = #{member_no}

SELECT p.project_no, p.project_status, pm.member_no, pm.member_position, m.name, m.profile_path, m.profile_name FROM project p JOIN project_member pm ON p.project_no = pm.project_no JOIN member m ON m.member_no = pm.member_no WHERE p.project_no = #{project_no} ORDER BY pm.member_position ASC;

SELECT name, profile_name, profile_path, member_position FROM member m INNER JOIN project_member pm ON pm.member_no = m.member_no INNER JOIN project p ON p.project_no = pm.project_no WHERE pm.project_no = #{project_no}
